list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the sound produced in a person's larynx and uttered through the mouth, as speech or song.
a particular opinion or attitude expressed.
the range of pitch or type of tone with which a person sings, such as soprano or tenor.
sound uttered with resonance of the vocal cords (used in the pronunciation of vowels and certain consonants).
a form or set of forms of a verb showing the relation of the subject to the action.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: get teachers to voice their opinions on important subjects
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Nhận giáo viên để nói lên ý kiến của họ về các môn học quan trọng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: utter (a speech sound) with resonance of the vocal cords (e.g. b, d, g, v, z ).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he is unable to voice the g sound
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ta không thể nói lên âm

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: regulate the tone quality of (organ pipes or a piano).
